control_attributes.Control: SA-10 (5) MAPPING INTEGRITY FOR VERSION CONTROL
control_attributes.control_description: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to maintain the integrity of the mapping between the  master build data (hardware drawings and software/firmware code) describing the current version of security-relevant hardware, software, and firmware and the on-site master copy of the data for the current version.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to perform a manual code review of [Assignment: organization-defined specific code] using [Assignment: organization-defined processes, procedures, and/or techniques].

Control Statement: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to maintain the integrity of the mapping between the  master build data (hardware drawings and software/firmware code) describing the current version of security-relevant hardware, software, and firmware and the on-site master copy of the data for the current version.
Control Name: SA-10 (5) MAPPING INTEGRITY FOR VERSION CONTROL
